mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM sys_permission p WHERE EXISTS( SELECT a.id FROM sys_role_permission a JOIN sys_role b ON a.role_id = b.id JOIN sys_user_role c ON c.role_id = b.id JOIN sys_user d ON d.id = c.user_id WHERE p.id = a.permission_id AND d.login_name = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND p.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY p.sort_no ASC
